name: Edge_Case_Very_Long_JD
description: Test case with very long job description to test parsing limits
job_description:
Senior Product Manager - Enterprise AI Solutions
Microsoft
Amsterdam, Netherlands

We are seeking an exceptional Senior Product Manager to lead our Enterprise AI Solutions portfolio. This role requires deep expertise in artificial intelligence, machine learning, natural language processing, computer vision, deep learning frameworks, neural networks, transformer models, large language models, generative AI, prompt engineering, fine-tuning, model deployment, MLOps, data engineering, vector databases, embeddings, RAG systems, retrieval augmented generation, semantic search, knowledge graphs, enterprise software, SaaS platforms, cloud computing, Azure, AWS, microservices, API development, system integration, Salesforce, SAP, CRM, ERP systems, workflow automation, business process optimization, stakeholder management, cross-functional leadership, agile methodologies, scrum, kanban, product roadmaps, product strategy, go-to-market strategy, competitive analysis, market research, user research, customer interviews, A/B testing, experimentation, metrics, KPIs, data analysis, SQL, Python, product analytics, user behavior, conversion optimization, growth hacking, revenue optimization, pricing strategy, business model innovation, international markets, regulatory compliance, GDPR, data privacy, security, risk management, and team leadership.

This is a senior-level position requiring 8+ years of product management experience with at least 3 years focused specifically on AI/ML products. You will be responsible for defining product vision, developing strategic roadmaps, managing complex stakeholder relationships across engineering, design, marketing, sales, and executive teams.
